attributes.action: Crown John Angarrack King Of Cornwall
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
John Angarrack is a tireless fighter for the Cornish people, (when he's not repairing washing machines.) From his Hobbit hole in Bodmin he infrequently lambasts the dreaded English, via the medium of his vanity published book.

 Once he gets a spell check and learns basic grammar nothing will stop these books becoming a might weapon in bringing down the English Imperial State.

He deserves far more to be crowned Prince of Cornwall than Charles the titular head of duchy.

We call on Mr Brown to set the wheels in motion for us to have Crown Prince John!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
